about_the_game:
Players solve puzzles as two cute robots in balanced cooperation, which are kept simple and fun with platforming elements.

First and foremost are always:

  • Working together throughout the game through cooperative puzzles
  • Goofing off and having fun together
.

Platform passages:

Must be overcome by skillful jumps.

Simple controls:

All puzzles can be solved by simple interaction

Cooperative puzzles:

Different perspectives provide increased communication and collusion between players.
Because: No puzzle can be solved alone

Replay value:

The challenge is not to come up with the solution, but to execute it. The fun of the game is not lost even with repeated play

Non-verbal storytelling:

Allows you to understand the story without language

Unique setting:

Invites you to explore a fascinating sci-fi Egyptian world

short_description: 2 cute robots on a treasure hunt in a mysterious sci-fi pyramid. Coopbots is a fun 2-player online co-op puzzle game. Players solve puzzles together and overcome platform elements to solve the mysteries of the pyramid and find a treasure or two.
